title: One Piece: Barto no Himitsu no Heya!
content:
I don't know why I keep reviewing random recap episodes, but I don't know why people read them anyway, so here I am cycling through this self-induced paradox.

This was a 2 episode parter recap that goes through the major bullet points of the Wano arc so far, I still suffer from the constant flashback of episodes 914 and 915 but this recap did not cut me any slack either, but for what it is, it was a nice catch up on everything happening as of now, the placement is understandable because of how close and tight the deadlines are, so do as many recaps asyou want Toei, as long as we get to have episodes like 1015 all over again.
